gutterSize.description: Size of the divider in pixels.

stateKey.description: Storage identifier of a stateful Splitter.

stateStorage.description: Defines where a stateful splitter keeps its state, valid values are 'session' for sessionStorage and 'local' for localStorage.

step.description: Step factor to increment/decrement the size of the panels while pressing the arrow keys.

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: resizestart
events.description: Callback to invoke when resize starts.

events.name: resizeend
events.description: Callback to invoke when resize ends.
